org.openhubframework.openhub.test.rest

Class TestRestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.test.rest.TestRestUtils

  • public final class TestRestUtils
extends Object
    TestRestUtils is a collection of REST-based utility methods for use in unit and integration testing scenarios.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Petr Juza

    • Method Detail

      • createPageQuery

        public static String createPageQuery(int page,
                                     int size)

        Formats the GET query based upon configuration. 

        
  createPageQuery(1,20) &rarr; p=1&s=20
        Parameters:
        page - the page number
        size - the size of page
        Returns:
        the query

      • createPagePair

        public static List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> createPagePair(int page,
                                                                 int size)

        Creates the GET pageable query based upon configuration. 

        
  createPagePair(1,20) &rarr; p=1&s=20
        Parameters:
        page - the page number
        size - the size of page
        Returns:
        the list of NameValuePair

      • createSortPair

        public static List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> createSortPair(org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)

        Creates the GET sortable query based upon configuration. With this method it is necessary to use URLDecoder#decode(String, String) to decode URL or use toUrl(URIBuilder). 

        
  createSortPair(new Sort(new Sort.Order(Sort.Direction.DESC, "dateFrom"))) &rarr; sort=name&name,dir=desc
        Parameters:
        sort - the sort instrument
        Returns:
        the list of NameValuePair
        See Also:
        URLDecoder.decode(String, String), toUrl(URIBuilder)

      • createDateQuery

        public static List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> createDateQuery(String paramName,
                                                                  LocalDate date)

        Creates the GET query for local date based upon configuration. 

        
  createDateQuery("dateFrom", LocalDate.now()) &rarr; dateFrom=2015-03-09
        Parameters:
        paramName - the name of attribute/parameter
        date - the local date value
        Returns:
        the list of NameValuePair that represents query parameter for date represented by paramName attribute

      • createPage

        public static org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable createPage(int page,
                                                                  int size)
        Creates Pageable object based upon configuration.
        Parameters:
        page - the number of page
        size - the size of page
        Returns:
        the Pageable

      • createJson

        public static javax.json.JsonObjectBuilder createJson()
        Creates JsonObjectBuilder to easy creation JSON objects and serialization into string. 
        
 final String content = createJson()
                          .add("p", 1)
                          .add("size", 20)
                          .add("fulltext", "value")
                              .build().toString();
        Returns:
        the JsonObjectBuilder

      • createGetUrl

        public static org.apache.http.client.utils.URIBuilder createGetUrl(String path)

        Construct an instance from the REST path which must be a valid URI. 

        
 final String context = createGetUrl("/rpc/orders")
      .addParameters(createPagePair(1, 20))
      .addParameter("fulltext", "value")
          .build().toString();
        Result: /rpc/orders?p=1&s=20&fulltext=value&createdFrom=2015-06-20
        Parameters:
        path - a valid REST URI path in string form

      • toUrl

        public static String toUrl(org.apache.http.client.utils.URIBuilder builder)
                    throws Exception
        Creates URL string based upon URIBuilder which is URL decoded in UTF8 character encoding.
        Parameters:
        builder - the URI builder
        Returns:
        the URL decoded URI as plain string
        Throws:
        Exception - occurs if URI is wrong
        See Also:
        URLDecoder.decode(String, String), UTF8

      • jsonObject

        public static <T> T jsonObject(org.springframework.test.web.servlet.MvcResult mockResult,
                               Class<T> valueType)
        Method to deserialize JSON content from given JSON content String.
        Type Parameters:
        T - JSON object type
        Parameters:
        mockResult - as result of mock that contains response as JSON string
        valueType - as type of object that represents JSON string
        Returns:
        the object that represents JSON content
        See Also:
        jsonObject(String, Class)

      • jsonObject

        public static <T> T jsonObject(String content,
                               Class<T> valueType)
        Method to deserialize JSON content from given JSON content String.
        Type Parameters:
        T - JSON object type
        Parameters:
        content - as JSON string
        valueType - as type of object that represents JSON string
        Returns:
        the object that represents JSON content
        See Also:
        jsonObject(MvcResult, Class)
